internacional.title: International
internacional.description: The classic game. Play to 100 or 150 points with standard rules. The player with the highest double (or heaviest tile) starts the game.

cubano.title: Cuban

dominicano.title: Dominican
dominicano.description: A fast-paced and competitive version from the Dominican Republic, played to 200 points. The double-six always starts the first round.

mexicano.title: Mexican
mexicano.description: Also known as Mexican Train. A popular social variant where players build their own 'trains' off a central hub. (This mode is not yet available).
